DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study compare two ultrasound-guided arterial cannulation procedure : in-plane infraclavicular axillary artery cannulation out-of-plane femoral artery cannulation .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound-guided Axillary Artery Vs Femoral Artery Cannulation .
DOC.criteria: mechanically ventilate critically ill patient indication artery cannulation radial artery cannulation unable perform age le 18 year trauma hematoma catheterization site clinically significant coagulation disorder infection catheterization site lack patient closest relatives content BMI > 35 kg/m2 precedent surgery operation femoral axillary artery clinically significant ischemia limb cannulation side
